content: Available is 1x Ballet 2021 Bull Market Limited Edition wallet cardThe units were opened for the purpose of submitting them for grading, but they were returned as "non-gradable" at the timeThere is some wear to the outer slip cases, but other than that items are in new conditionAccepting offers on any or all of them.
